text: The Francisco Morazán Championship was a yearly football tournament which was played in Honduras from 1947 to 1964. The tournament included teams from the department of Francisco Morazán only and served as a qualification phase to the national championship, also known as the Honduran Amateur League.DiarioMas.hn – Olimpia vs Motagua en los campeonatos olvidados de 1947 a 1964 – 22 August 2016 ==Winners== {| class="wikitable" |- !
